Yandex Disk.name: P02b.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it directly notifies users about all changes to its algorithmic system development policies?

Yandex Disk.name: P02b.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose how it will directly notify users of changes?

Yandex Disk.name: P02b.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose the time frame within which it directly notifies users of changes notification prior to these changes coming into effect?

Yandex Disk.name: P02b.04
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company maintain a public archive or change log?
